title: Automated Social Domain Learning Pathway Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: An advanced social studies program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields. Offers personalized learning paths through learner-customized knowledge structure analysis.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately identify the semantic connection structure between core social studies concepts with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can establish a personalized learning plan within three months based on an automated system-recommended learning path.
Learners can achieve 85 points or higher (out of 100) in their summative assessment for social phenomenon analysis competency.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
